quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote:
For web designers, there are four keys to surviving bad
economic times: do good work, charge a fair price, lower
your overhead, and be sure you are communicating with your
client.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote:
Be a part of the innovation that leads the wave. Don’t wait
for technology to catch up to you or you’ll end up sliding
down the back side of that wave. If you choose to be a part
of it happening, you can ride on top.
quotes.author: Jon Landau

quotes.quote:
The major difference between a thing that might go wrong and
a thing that cannot possibly go wrong is that when a thing
that cannot possibly go wrong goes wrong it usually turns
out to be impossible to get at or repair.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Great stories happen to people who can tell them.
quotes.author: Ira Glass

quotes.quote:
Find the simple story in the product, and present it in an
articulate and intelligent, persuasive way.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote:
Don’t spend too much time planning, release early and often,
some things will work, others won’t, refine and move forward
and above all forget the money, just make sure you love what
you’re doing.
quotes.author: Kevin Rose

quotes.quote: The enemy of every author is not piracy, but obscurity.
quotes.author: Chris Anderson

quotes.quote: Don’t mistake legibility for communication.
quotes.author: David Carson

quotes.quote:
Design is the application of intent – the opposite of
happenstance, and an antidote to accident.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: Simplify, then add lightness.
quotes.author: Colin Chapman

quotes.quote:
It’s not in the vulgar, it’s not in the shock that one finds
art. And it’s not in the excessively beautiful. It’s in
between; it’s in nuance.
quotes.author: Duane Michals

quotes.quote:
When we have clients who are thinking about Flash splash
pages, we tell them to go to their local supermarket and
bring a mime with them. Have the mime stand in front of the
supermarket, and, as each customer tries to enter, do a
little show that lasts two minutes, welcoming them to the
supermarket and trying to explain the bread is on aisle six
and milk is on sale today.

Then stand back and count how many people watch the mime,
how many people get past the mime as quickly as possible,
and how many people punch the mime out.

That should give you a good idea as to how well their splash
page will be received.
quotes.author: Jared Spool

quotes.quote:
Always design a thing by considering it in its next larger
context – a chair in a room, a room in a house, a house in
an environment, an environment in a city plan.
quotes.author: Eliel Saarinen

quotes.quote: If design isn’t profitable, then it’s art.
quotes.author: Henrik Fiskar

quotes.quote: The pushy bird gets the worm.
quotes.author: Sean Adams

quotes.quote:
[If] people are made safer, more comfortable, more eager to
purchase, more efficient, or just happier, the designer has
succeeded.
quotes.author: Henry Dreyfuss

quotes.quote:
Be a part of the innovation that leads the wave. Don’t wait
for technology to catch up to you or you’ll end up sliding
down the back side of that wave. If you choose to be a part
of it happening, you can ride on top.
quotes.author: Jon Landau

quotes.quote:
We use the letters of our alphabet every day with the utmost
ease and unconcern, taking them for granted as the air we
breathe. We do not realize that each of these letters is at
our service today only as the result of a long and
laboriously slow process of evolution in the age-old art of
writing.
quotes.author: Douglas C. McMurtle

quotes.quote:
It’s strange, I’ve seen colours at times that when I’ve gone
back to check on them, they’ve vanished…
quotes.author: William Percy Weston

quotes.quote:
Drawing is speaking to the eye; talking is painting to the
ear.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as simple. Simple is hard.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.quote:
We aren’t designing photocopies of web pages, we’re
designing web pages.
quotes.author: Andy Clarke

quotes.quote:
There’s a difference between being obsessed and being
motivated.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerburg

quotes.quote:
When we have clients who are thinking about Flash splash
pages, we tell them to go to their local supermarket and
bring a mime with them. Have the mime stand in front of the
supermarket, and, as each customer tries to enter, do a
little show that lasts two minutes, welcoming them to the
supermarket and trying to explain the bread is on aisle six
and milk is on sale today.

Then stand back and count how many people watch the mime,
how many people get past the mime as quickly as possible,
and how many people punch the mime out.

That should give you a good idea as to how well their splash
page will be received.
quotes.author: Jared Spool

quotes.quote:
Google has the functionality of a really complicated Swiss
Army knife, but the home page is our way of approaching it
closed. It’s simple, it’s elegant, you can slip it in your
pocket, but it’s got the great doodad when you need it. A
lot of our competitors are like a Swiss Army knife open –
and that can be intimidating and occasionally harmful.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote:
Find something you’re passionate about and keep tremendously
interested in it.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Complaining is silly. Act or forget.
quotes.author: Stefan Stagmeister

quotes.quote:
I love making the stuff, that’s sort of the core of it. I
love creating the stuff. It’s so satisfying to get from the
beginning to the end, from a shaky nothing idea to something
that’s well formed and the audience really likes. It’s like
a drug: You keep trying to do it again and again and again.
I’ve learned from experience that if you work harder at it,
and apply more energy and time to it, and more consistency,
you get a better result. It comes from the work.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote:
If everyone likes your design, it’s banal. Mediocrity shirks
offense. Art dares it.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote:
I really like looking at design and thinking: that attention
to detail must have taken absolutely ages.
quotes.author: Si Scott

quotes.quote:
Simplicity will stand out, while complexity will get lost in
the crowd.
quotes.author: Kevin Barnett

quotes.quote:
I try and be as stupid as possible regarding my profession,
which means I try to look at as few design magazines as
possible.
quotes.author: Ettore Sottsass

quotes.quote:
Good design is all about making other designers feel like
idiots because that idea wasn’t theirs.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: Everything is designed. Few things are designed well.
quotes.author: Brian Reed

quotes.quote:
Perfection is boring. Getting better is where all the fun
is.
quotes.author: Dragos Roua

quotes.quote:
If we have trouble using something then it’s probably
because that thing is badly designed, rather than us being
stupid.
quotes.author: Dmitry Fadeyev

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, pretty colors make people drool.
quotes.author: Nathan Rice

quotes.quote:
To be outstanding – get comfortable with being
uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Alrik Koudenburg

quotes.quote:
Do we really need a simple definition of design or should we
accept that design is too complex a matter to be summarized
in less than a book?
quotes.author: Bryan Lawson

quotes.quote:
I think if you’re starting out early in the process by
talking about your ideas for solutions, you’re already not
listening. I think you need to enter into any design project
with that zen learner’s mind of ‘I don’t know what I don’t
know.’
quotes.author: Kim Goodwin

quotes.quote:
Turning away bad clients can leave you feeling oddly guilty.
They’re sort of like alcoholic or meth head cousins who
force you, by their own bad behavior into denying them
things you wouldn’t deny other people. You’re left feeling
not quite yourself.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wood

quotes.quote:
Suppose I showed you two rooms where in one a group of
programmers was developing a program to monitor a heart
patient and keep him alive until the doctors arrive if
something goes wrong and in the other a group of street
people was using Microsoft Word to write letters to their
parole officers. You would not be able to tell the rooms
apart.
quotes.author: Richard P. Gabriel

quotes.quote:
Because every person knows what he likes, every person
thinks he is an expert on user interfaces.
quotes.author: Paul Heckel

quotes.quote:
People don’t use a product because of the great design;
great design helps them use the product.
quotes.author: Viran Anuradha Dayaratne

quotes.quote:
Don’t try and reinvent the wheel – just work on making it
better than anyone else.
quotes.author: David A. Stuebe

quotes.quote:
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable
from magic.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote:
The way to “get your name out there” is to establish a
pattern of excellent work and a reputation for integrity
over several years.
quotes.author: Andy Rutledge

quotes.quote:
I am always doing that which I can not do, in order that I
may learn how to do it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote:
Be regular and orderly in your life like a bourgeois, so
that you may be violent and original in your work.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Keep it simple, stupid!
quotes.author: Old Saying

quotes.quote: Those who don’t build must burn.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote:
Never fall in love with an idea. They’re whores. If the one
you’re with isn’t doing the job, there’s always, always,
always another.
quotes.author: Chip Kidd

quotes.quote:
Just because something looks good doesn’t mean its useful.
And just because something is useful does not make it
beautiful.
quotes.author: Joshua Brewer

quotes.quote:
As if a device can function if it has no style. As if a
device can be called stylish that does not function
superbly… yes, beauty matters. Boy, does it matter. It is
not surface, it is not an extra, it is the thing itself.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote:
Whether you think you can or whether you think you can’t –
you are right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote:
The web is the ultimate customer-empowering environment. He
or she who clicks the mouse gets to decide everything. It is
so easy to go elsewhere; all the competitors in the world
are but a mouseclick away.
quotes.author: Jakob Nielsen

quotes.quote:
Typography has one plain duty before it and that is to
convey information in writing. No argument or consideration
can absolve typography from this duty.
quotes.author: Emil Ruder

quotes.quote:
My rates are as follows:
$50/hr.
$75/hr. if you watch
$100/hr. if you help
quotes.author: An Autobody Sign

quotes.quote:
People think that design is styling. Design is not style.
It’s not about giving shape to the shell and not giving a
damn about the guts. Good design is a renaissance attitude
that combines technology, cognitive science, human need, and
beauty to produce something that the world didn’t know it
was missing.
quotes.author: Paola Antonelli

quotes.quote:
We are not artists or poets. We are artisans and craftsmen.
Our products solve problems. They do not hang on museum
walls.
quotes.author: Dan Lacivita

quotes.quote:
If it’s a good idea and it gets you excited, try it, and if
it bursts into flames, that’s going to be exciting too.
People always ask, ‘What is your greatest failure?’ I always
have the same answer—We’re working on it right now, it’s
gonna be awesome!
quotes.author: Jim Coudal

quotes.quote: Usage is like oxygen for ideas.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.quote:
Design must be functional and functionality must be
translated into visual aesthetics, without any reliance on
gimmicks that have to be explained.
quotes.author: Ferdinand A. Porsche

quotes.quote:
Testing one user early in the project is better than testing
fifty near the end.
quotes.author: Steve Krug

quotes.quote:
If you want to build a ship, don’t drum up people to collect
wood and don’t assign them tasks and work, but rather teach
them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.quote: Recognizing the need is the primary condition for design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote:
Geometry can produce legible letters, but art alone makes
the beautiful. Art begins where geometry ends, and imparts
to letters a character transcending mere measurement.
quotes.author: Paul Standard

quotes.quote:
The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as
possible.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote:
I like jumping back and forth between a few different things
to let my subconscious chew on one problem while my
conscious works on something else.
quotes.author: Loren Brichter

quotes.quote:
A picture is worth a thousand words. An interface is worth a
thousand pictures.
quotes.author: Ben Shneiderman

quotes.quote:
I don’t want something special. I want something beautifully
plain.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote:
Those who say “it’s not personal, it’s just business” are
lying. All business is personal, and the best business is
very personal.
quotes.author: Richard Lenz

quotes.quote:
We are so busying measuring public opinion that we forget we
can mold it. We are so busy listening to statistics we
forget we can create them.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote:
With type as with philosophy, music and food, it is better
to have a little of the best than to be swamped with the
derivative, the careless, the routine.
quotes.author: Robert Bringhurst

quotes.quote:
I loathe the phrase “no questions asked.” Great service is
about communication, sincerity, and action – not blind
automation.
quotes.author: Marshall Bonobos

quotes.quote: Only work with people you’d invite to your home for a meal.
quotes.author: Garth Walker

quotes.quote:
Never offend people with style when you can offend them with
substance.
quotes.author: Sam Brown

quotes.quote:
I love the comment, “You must love designing for a living.”
At that point I usually start to laugh or break into
uncontrollable tears.
quotes.author: Andrew Lewis

quotes.quote:
A drawing should have no unnecessary lines and a machine no
unnecessary parts.
quotes.author: William Strunk Jr.

quotes.quote: Smart people are attracted to stories, not feature lists.
quotes.author: Johnnie Manzari

quotes.quote: What garlic is to food, insanity is to art.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote:
Delete, delete, delete and at the end find the ‘core aspect
of the design’.
quotes.author: Achille Castiglioni

quotes.quote: We should pursue and practice moderation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Less is more.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quotes.quote: It’s OK to do stupid things, except when you notice them.
quotes.author: Kenny Shopsin

quotes.quote:
If all else fails, [working harder than anyone else] is the
greatest competitive advantage of any career.
quotes.author: John C Jay

quotes.quote:
To attempt mastery of everything inevitably makes us
mediocre in many areas.
quotes.author: Simon Collison

quotes.quote: Do what I want, not what I say.
quotes.author: Brian Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote:
One of the tragedies of the design scene is that it always
acts too late.
quotes.author: Hans-Redolf Lutz

quotes.quote:
If I forget the words, they weren’t very memorable in the
first place.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote:
Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because
they get overcome by the beauty of the picture – and forget
that merchandise must be sold.
quotes.author: James Randolph Adams

quotes.quote:
The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of
things, but their inward significance.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote:
In the design process, my gut instinct is my best critic. I
just wish I would always listen to it!
quotes.author: Bryan Tamayo

quotes.quote:
There is only one type of designer — the type that cares
about type.
quotes.author: Rohan Nanavati

quotes.quote: Tell it like it is, in a way they want to hear it.
quotes.author: Wihan Meerholz

quotes.quote: Information is cheap, meaning is expensive.
quotes.author: George Dyson

quotes.quote:
Roses are red, violets are blue. I wont send the job unless
you pay me.
quotes.author: Giulio Pinotti

quotes.quote:
Right and wrong do not exist in graphic design. There is
only effective and non-effective communication.
quotes.author: Peter Bilak

quotes.quote:
If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope
for it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Interesting things never happen to me. I happen to them.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote:
The grid is like the lines on a football field. You can play
a great game in the grid or a lousy game. But the goal is to
play a really fine game.
quotes.author: Wim Crouwel

quotes.quote:
Don’t let your design resist your readers. Don’t let it
stand in the way of what they want to do: read.
quotes.author: Steve Krug

quotes.quote:
In the matter of layout, forget art and use horse-sense. The
printer-designer’s whole duty is to make a clear
presentation of the message… This calls for an exercise of
common sense and faculty of analysis rather than for art.
quotes.author: William Addison Dwiggins

quotes.quote:
Creativity is a habit. It’s not something that happens in
the shower.
quotes.author: Nick Law

quotes.quote:
A mystery is the most stimulating force in unleashing the
imagination.
quotes.author: Zuzana Licko and Rudy VanderLans

quotes.quote:
It’s not about knowing all the gimmicks and photo tricks. If
you haven’t got the eye, no program will give it to you.
quotes.author: David Carson

quotes.quote:
The next time you see a sixteen-color, blind-embossed,
gold-stamped, die-cut, elaborately folded and bound job,
printed on handmade paper, see if it isn’t a mediocre idea
trying to pass for something else.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote:
A lot of companies have tried to support designers by giving
them “a seat at the table.” What this usually means in
practice, however, is that a designer is sitting at the
table well after the important product decisions that
influence the design have been made. This is usually where
complicated and muddy designs are born.
quotes.author: Rebekah Cox

quotes.quote:
We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see
plenty there that needs to be done.
quotes.author: Alan Turing

quotes.quote: The ultimate inspiration is the deadline.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote:
When you’re passionate about what you do, you become an
evangelist for the very thing you do.
quotes.author: Jonathan Snook

quotes.quote:
Design is more of a kitchen than a knife, and more of a lab
than a beaker.
quotes.author: Arman Nobari

quotes.quote: Ideas are worthless. Execution is everything.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote:
I make all my decisions on intuition. But then, I must know
why I made that decision. I throw a spear into the darkness.
That is intuition. Then I must send an army into the
darkness to find the spear. That is intellect.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: The process is really just Iterate, Iterate, Iterate.
quotes.author: Chris Clark

quotes.quote:
Questions about whether design is necessary or affordable
are quite beside the point: design is inevitable. The
alternative to good design is bad design, not no design at
all.
quotes.author: Douglas Martin

quotes.quote: Practicality is the serial killer of dreams.
quotes.author: Rasha Hamdan

quotes.quote:
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not
an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote:
Instead of asking the user to make a choice up front, maybe
we can set a smart default and see if there is high demand
after launch for more customization.
quotes.author: Rebecca Rolfe

quotes.quote:
We explore promising avenues that, days later, become dead
ends. Sometimes, we solve a month’s problem in an hour.
quotes.author: Cennydd Bowles

quotes.quote:
A beef filet cooked for 15 hours by 30 cooks doesn’t
necessarily taste better than a cheeseburger.
quotes.author: Oliver Reichenstein

quotes.quote:
Nobody can tell you if what you’re doing is good, meaningful
or worthwhile. The more compelling the path, the more lonely
it is.
quotes.author: Hugh Macleod

quotes.quote:
…the wisest course of action is to take your best shot with
a prototype, immediately get to market, and iterate quickly.
If you wait for ideal circumstances in which you have all
the information you need (which is impossible) the market
will pass you by.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote:
Perfection is boring. Getting better is where all the fun
is.
quotes.author: Dragos Roua

quotes.quote:
Being able to take ideas and transform them into something
tangible is life-affirming.
quotes.author: Melinda Santillian

quotes.quote:
I don’t know the key to success, but the key to failure is
trying to please everybody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote:
Simply making decisions, one after another, can be a form of
art.
quotes.author: John Gruber

quotes.quote:
You can be misunderstood exactly once. After that, you are
not being misunderstood; you are communicating poorly.
quotes.author: Josh Collinsworth

quotes.quote:
When you’re a carpenter making a beautiful chest of drawers,
you’re not going to use a piece of plywood on the back, even
though it faces the wall and nobody will ever see it. You’ll
know it’s there, so you’re going to use a beautiful piece of
wood on the back. For you to sleep well at night, the
aesthetic, the quality, has to be carried all the way
through.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Good design is good business.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson, Jr.

quotes.quote:
We have to learn to see technical devices and software as
others see them. Feeling a sense of pride in getting a
device to do what we want doesn’t mean we’re clever, it
means the design was wrong.
quotes.author: Jeremy Allison

quotes.quote: A design is a designer’s mind in a suit.
quotes.author: Nasa Munir

quotes.quote:
Everything is possible, that’s what science is all about.
No, that’s what’s being a Magical Elf is all about.
quotes.author: The Professor (on Futurama)

quotes.quote:
There’s a difference between making an imitation and selling
it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Hoefler

quotes.quote:
Says who? Just so you know, the people who talk that way
think that monkeys can do this. They take all this monkey
crap and just stick it in a briefcase completely unaware
that their success depends on something more than their
shoeshine. YOU are the product. You- FEELING something.
That’s what sells. Not them. Not sex. They can’t do what we
do, and they hate us for it.
quotes.author: Don Draper

quotes.quote:
Instead of searching for inspiration, how about you search
out someone to inspire.
quotes.author: Tony Kim

quotes.quote:
Design is a solution to a problem. Art is a question to a
problem.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: Art is making something out of nothing and selling it.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote:
I’ve always held to the belief that the practice of creating
compelling graphic design occurs not by employing the
principals of a democracy, but rather, that of a monarchy.
quotes.author: Thomas Vasquez

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as simple. Simple is hard.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.quote: The best an idea gets is when it’s in your head.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote:
More designers should share space, share resources. Sort of
an upscale communism.
quotes.author: April Greiman

quotes.quote:
The way to “get your name out there” is to establish a
pattern of excellent work and a reputation for integrity
over several years.
quotes.author: Andy Rutledge

quotes.quote:
Everything was just a wild guess. And it takes a while to
get confident that you’re guessing pretty good.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote:
It’s extremely difficult to be simultaneously concerned with
the end-user experience of whatever it is that you’re
building and the architecture of the program that delivers
that experience.
quotes.author: James Hague

quotes.quote:
A picture is worth a thousand words. An interface is worth a
thousand pictures.
quotes.author: Ben Shneiderman

quotes.quote:
Inspiration is hogwash. My work comes directly out of my
loves and hates. Muses don’t whisper in my ear, and ideas
don’t flow over my body like a cool rain.
quotes.author: James Victore

quotes.quote:
Whenever I have an idea I write it down, even if it’s not a
very good idea. Sometimes the bad ideas will lead to better
ones.
quotes.author: Steven Snell

quotes.quote:
… try to absorb what is useful, discard what is useless, and
add what is essentially your own.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Broken gets fixed. Shoddy lasts forever.
quotes.author: Jack Moffet

quotes.quote:
[If] people are made safer, more comfortable, more eager to
purchase, more efficient, or just happier, the designer has
succeeded.
quotes.author: Henry Dreyfuss

quotes.quote: The hole and the patch should be commensurate.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote:
The goal of a designer is to listen, observe, understand,
sympathize, empathize, synthesize, and glean insights that
enable him or her to make the invisible visible.
quotes.author: Hillman Curtis

quotes.quote: We adore chaos because we love to produce order.
quotes.author: M.C. Escher

quotes.quote:
Everybody in advertising is blonde, beautiful, families are
happy, care are never in traffic, everything is shiny, food
looks like it’s incredibly taseful. I ask myself, “How
stupid are we?”
quotes.author: Oliveiro Toscani

quotes.quote:
Right and wrong do not exist in graphic design. There is
only effective and non-effective communication.
quotes.author: Peter Bilak

quotes.quote:
What problem have you solved, ever, that was worth solving
where you knew all the given information in advance? No
problem worth solving is like that. In the real world; you
have a surplus of information and you have to filter it or;
you don’t have sufficient information and you have to go
find some.
quotes.author: Dan Meyer

quotes.quote:
My adventure has all been in my mind. The great adventure
has been thinking. I love to think about things. I think
that the lack of drama in my life has produced a platform
for me to be fundamentally adventurous in my thinking.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote:
It is important not to let the perfect become the enemy of
the good, even when you can agree on what perfect is. Doubly
so when you can’t. As unpleasant as it is to be trapped by
past mistakes, you can’t make any progress by being afraid
of your own shadow during design.
quotes.author: Greg Hudson

quotes.quote:
Propaganda supersedes fact, truth and common sense in all
cases.
quotes.author: P.S.C. Trier

quotes.quote:
Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee, and
just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote:
My rates are as follows:
$50/hr.
$75/hr. if you watch
$100/hr. if you help
quotes.author: An Autobody Sign

quotes.quote:
Think like a wise man but communicate in the language of the
people.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote:
It’s not about what you make, it’s about what you make them
feel.
quotes.author: Andrea Trew

quotes.quote:
It has taken my entire life to understand what I already
knew about creating art in 3rd grade.
quotes.author: Philip Carrera

quotes.quote:
Graphic design will save the world right after rock and roll
does.
quotes.author: David Carson

quotes.quote:
For me, design is like choosing what I’m going to wear for
the day – only much more complicated and not really the same
at all.
quotes.author: Robynne Raye

quotes.quote:
Modernism does not mean minimalism, contemporary does not
forsake tradition, and technology does not mean abandon
people and senses.
quotes.author: Tord Boontje

quotes.quote:
The most effective way to make a design usable is to make it
interesting enough that people want to use it.
quotes.author: Bryan Grezeszak

quotes.quote:
Experts are rarely insulted by something that is clear
enough for beginners. Everybody appreciates clarity.
quotes.author: Steve Krug

quotes.quote:
At the age of six I wanted to be a cook. At seven I wanted
to be Napoleon. And my ambition has been growing steadily
ever since.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote:
I In fact choose to use a coffeemaker to boil vegetables.
Why? Because if I used something else that just makes
coffee, my client would ask me “Can it boil vegetables?”
quotes.author: Joel Fisher

quotes.quote:
Check your bookshelf. If it’s full of titles on HTML, CSS,
and the like, instead of typography, color, and layout, you
may be missing a key ingredient in the designer’s knowledge
diet.
quotes.author: Jeff Croft

quotes.quote:
Instead of searching for inspiration, how about you search
out someone to inspire.
quotes.author: Tony Kim

quotes.quote:
Standards are like sex; one mistake, and you’re stuck
supporting it forever!
quotes.author: Mark Pilgrim

quotes.quote:
The prerequisite of originality is the art of forgetting, at
the proper moment, what we know.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Styles come and go. Good design is a language, not a style.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: There’s no duo more passionate than the design and me.
quotes.author: Gonxalo Blanco

quotes.quote:
The sudden hunch, the creative leap of mind that “sees” in a
flash how to solve a problem in a simple way, is something
quite different from general intelligence.
quotes.author: Martin Gardner

quotes.quote:
Technology makes what was once impossible possible. Design
makes it real.
quotes.author: Michael Gagliano

quotes.quote:
It is not so hard to be original, what is hard, is to be
original with continuity.
quotes.author: Andrés Segovia

quotes.quote:
It is not daily increase but daily decrease; hack away the
unessential.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote:
Never re-invent the wheel, unless you’re sure the client
needn’t go anywhere.
quotes.author: Russell Bishop

quotes.quote:
Be regular and orderly in your life like a bourgeois, so
that you may be violent and original in your work.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote:
I don’t think that all people read in the same way. Today,
entire generations are growing up watching MTV and playing
video games and it is safe to assume that these people have
a high degree of visual sophistication. and are not easily
discouraged by a lens straightforward or ambiguous
typography. On the contrary, they are attracted and enticed
to read something because of visual richness.
quotes.author: Ruby Vanderlans

quotes.quote: Don’t let the truth get in the way of a good story
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote:
Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Design is
knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote:
Sometimes the best way to prove your own value is to let a
client play the field.
quotes.author: Matthew Haeck

quotes.quote: Design works best when it gets out of the user’s way.
quotes.author: Neil Gajera

quotes.quote:
Design is not the narrow application of formal skills, it is
a way of thinking.
quotes.author: Chris Pullman

quotes.quote: Moderation in all things, including moderation.
quotes.author: Petronius

quotes.quote: Luck is the residue of design.
quotes.author: Branch Rickey

quotes.quote:
Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they
must live.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: I make solutions nobody wants to problems that don’t exist.
quotes.author: Alvin Lustig

quotes.quote:
Design is more than just a few tricks to the eye. It’s a few
tricks to the brain.
quotes.author: Neville Brody

quotes.quote:
The Fire Department has traditionally considered
architecture a priority only when it’s burning down.
quotes.author: Justin Davidson

quotes.quote: We make the whole widget.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Designers must be stewards of design rather than dictators.
quotes.author: Cassie McDaniel

quotes.quote: Styles come and go. Good design is a language, not a style.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote:
People always ask, “What do you think of my site?” I want to
say back to them, “Who cares what I think. Does it meet your
site requirements? Has it been tested? Has each requirement
been validated? Are your site guidelines being adhered to?”
quotes.author: Kim Krause

quotes.quote:
A designer, like an archaeologist or geologist; researches,
uncovers and adds context to precious, overlooked treasures
by digging deep beneath the surface.
quotes.author: Scott Theisen

quotes.quote:
Don’t you miss doing creative stuff, as an engineer? Don’t
you miss the creativity of the art world? You can say: I’m
working on an infinite canvas capable of any size and shape,
that’s already glowing every color possible into the eyes of
just about everyone on the planet. And I get to decide the
kind of experience, feeling, and emotion they are going to
have. How is that not creative?
quotes.author: Natalya Shelburne

quotes.quote:
When I design, I don’t consider the technical or commercial
parameters so much as the desire for a dream that humans
have attempted to project onto an object.
quotes.author: Philippe Starck

quotes.quote:
When you’re passionate about what you do, you become an
evangelist for the very thing you do.
quotes.author: Jonathan Snook

quotes.quote: Verbalizing design is another act of design.
quotes.author: Kenya Hara

quotes.quote: Never show fools unfinished work.
quotes.author: Michael Schrage

quotes.quote:
The worst logo applied well is better than the best logo
applied poorly.
quotes.author: Jacob Cass

quotes.quote: The hole and the patch should be commensurate.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote:
The prerequisite of originality is the art of forgetting, at
the proper moment, what we know.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote:
In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in
the expert’s mind there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: There are no bad ideas, just bad decisions.
quotes.author: Jacob Cass

quotes.quote: It’s OK to do stupid things, except when you notice them.
quotes.author: Kenny Shopsin

quotes.quote: Art is making something out of nothing and selling it.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.
quotes.author: Frank Capra

quotes.quote:
Not everyone notices the flowers you plant, but everyone
will notice the fire you start.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote:
Users will tell you what they think they want.
Users will tell you what they think you want to hear.
Users will tell you what they think sounds good.
Users will not tell you what you need to know.
You have to watch them to discover that.
quotes.author: Adam Judge

quotes.quote: Man up, admit it isn’t good enough, and fix it now.
quotes.author: Robert Nealan

quotes.quote:
Creating something out of thin air is easy. It’s finding the
air that’s hard.
quotes.author: Asher Trotter

quotes.quote: I warn you against believing that advertising is a science.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote:
Choosing a typeface is an act of subtlety, like casting an
actor: the best person to play a gardener is somebody who
looks like they might belong outdoors — not somebody who is
covered in flowers and shrubbery.
quotes.author: Josh Collinsworth

quotes.quote:
When we have clients who are thinking about Flash splash
pages, we tell them to go to their local supermarket and
bring a mime with them. Have the mime stand in front of the
supermarket, and, as each customer tries to enter, do a
little show that lasts two minutes, welcoming them to the
supermarket and trying to explain the bread is on aisle six
and milk is on sale today.

Then stand back and count how many people watch the mime,
how many people get past the mime as quickly as possible,
and how many people punch the mime out.

That should give you a good idea as to how well their splash
page will be received.
quotes.author: Jared Spool

quotes.quote: Design is the body language of your marketing. Don’t slouch.
quotes.author: Mark King

quotes.quote:
I don’t want something special. I want something beautifully
plain.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: I never let my schooling get in the way of my education.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Usage is like oxygen for ideas.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.quote:
Simplicity should be found in the execution, not in the
meaning.
quotes.author: Nicholas Burroughs

quotes.quote:
If a feature or product were legitimately easy the user
would not be writing in to support about how stuck they are.
Sure, some percentage of users will find questions to ask
about any interface. But do you want to start the
conversation by assuming the user falls into that
percentage? You venture to learn much more if you assume the
software is wrong, not the user.
quotes.author: Andrew Spittle

quotes.quote:
Making good design is easy. It’s polishing the half-assed
stuff that takes time.
quotes.author: Stefan G. Bucher

quotes.quote: Computers are to design as microwaves are to cooking.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote:
A designer who gives her art away, makes no pay. A designer
who keeps her art to herself, makes no friends.
quotes.author: Amber Seree Allen

quotes.quote:
In most agencies, account executives outnumber the
copywriters two to one. If you were a dairy farmer, would
you employ twice as many milkers as you had cows?
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote:
Good design at the front-end suggests that everything is in
order at the back-end, whether or not that is the case.
quotes.author: Dmitry Fadeyev

quotes.quote:
The strategy in communications is not to sell the 1/4″-inch
drill bit, but the 1/4″-inch hole.
quotes.author: Robert Louey

quotes.quote:
I think if you’re starting out early in the process by
talking about your ideas for solutions, you’re already not
listening. I think you need to enter into any design project
with that zen learner’s mind of ‘I don’t know what I don’t
know.’
quotes.author: Kim Goodwin

quotes.quote:
If all else fails, [working harder than anyone else] is the
greatest competitive advantage of any career.
quotes.author: John C Jay

quotes.quote:
Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money
they don’t have for something they don’t need.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Advertising = Hey You + Buy Something
quotes.author: Craig Damrauer

quotes.quote: Where I come from, gettin’ visual is habitual.
quotes.author: GZA

quotes.quote:
Turning away bad clients can leave you feeling oddly guilty.
They’re sort of like alcoholic or meth head cousins who
force you, by their own bad behavior into denying them
things you wouldn’t deny other people. You’re left feeling
not quite yourself.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wood

quotes.quote: Bad design shouts at you. Good design is the silent seller.
quotes.author: Shane Meendering

quotes.quote:
It takes the same amount of effort to make bad art as to
make good art, and you won’t know which you’ve made until
you release it into the wild. You can continue to refine a
work until it doesn’t set off your own quality alarms, but
that’s no guarantee that what you’ve made will touch
anybody.
quotes.author: Nate Simpson

quotes.quote:
To be truly great, we have to understand the motivation of
our clients, maintain constant two-way communication with
shockingly uncreative people, get a firm handle on
copywriting and how that craft exists symbiotically with the
visual element, and foresee how the finished whole will be
greater than the sum of the bits and pieces we spent hours
obsessing over. All of these factors cascade into the final
product.
quotes.author: Kevin Potts

quotes.quote:
Descriptions are like skirts, they should be long enough to
cover the subject, but short enough to keep things
interesting.
quotes.author: Gidsy.com

quotes.quote:
The advice I like to give young artists, or really anybody
who’ll listen to me, is not to wait around for inspiration.
Inspiration is for amateurs; the rest of us just show up and
get to work.

If you wait around for the clouds to part and a bolt of
lightning to strike you in the brain, you are not going to
do an awful lot of work. All the best ideas come out of the
process; they come out of the work itself.

Things occur to you. If you’re sitting around trying to
dream up a great idea, you can sit there a long time before
anything happens. But if you just get to work, something
will occur to you and something else will occur to you and
something else that you reject will push you in another
direction.

Inspiration is absolutely unnecessary and somehow deceptive.
You feel like you need this great idea before you can get
down to work, and I find that’s almost never the case.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote:
I love making the stuff, that’s sort of the core of it. I
love creating the stuff. It’s so satisfying to get from the
beginning to the end, from a shaky nothing idea to something
that’s well formed and the audience really likes. It’s like
a drug: You keep trying to do it again and again and again.
I’ve learned from experience that if you work harder at it,
and apply more energy and time to it, and more consistency,
you get a better result. It comes from the work.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote:
Graphic design is the paradise of individuality,
eccentricity, heresy, abnormality, hobbies, and humors.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: When in doubt, use Caslon.
quotes.author: William Caslon

quotes.quote:
You never can do what the kids do. What you do is look at
yourself and find your own way to address the fact that the
times have changed and that you have to pay attention. You
can’t be a designer and say, “Oh, this is timeless.” Nothing
is timeless!
quotes.author: Paula Scher

quotes.quote: When is the last time you saw a Lamborghini sale?
quotes.author: Chris Campbell

quotes.quote:
Cheap design is like a tattoo… once you get it you’re
forever branded with it.
quotes.author: Ken Peters

quotes.quote:
It’s not about knowing all the gimmicks and photo tricks. If
you haven’t got the eye, no program will give it to you.
quotes.author: David Carson

quotes.quote:
As we know,
There are known knowns.
There are things we know we know.
We also know
There are known unknowns.
That is to say
We know there are some things
We do not know.
But there are also unknown unknowns,
The ones we don’t know
We don’t know.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Innovation is seldom hindered by platform.
quotes.author: Blue Saunders

quotes.quote:
The value, and especially the legitimization of design will
be, in the future, measured more in terms of how it can
enable us to survive… on this planet.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote:
If you’re more susceptible to interruption, you do more out
of the box thinking.
quotes.author: Don Norman

quotes.quote:
Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to
add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint Exupéry

quotes.quote:
To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan, and
not quite enough time.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote:
Marketing without design is lifeless, and design without
marketing is mute.
quotes.author: Von R. Glitschka

quotes.quote:
Modern typographic axioms:

 * Different purpose demands different style.
 * The modern reader has no leisure.
 * Gutenberg left no rules for automobile ads.
 * Today’s reader doesn’t read — he glimpses.
 * Lucidity, clarity, fitness is the aim.
quotes.author: Lucian Bernhard

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: “It looks good” is the worst feedback you can get.
quotes.author: Whitney Hess

quotes.quote:
Best thing about creating something is that it starts living
it’s own life.
quotes.author: Hristo Panayotov

quotes.quote: Web design is art wrapped in technology.
quotes.author: James Weaver

quotes.quote:
You can use an eraser on the drafting table or a sledge
hammer on the construction site.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote:
If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from
the head, almost nothing.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: Those who don’t build must burn.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote:
Clients don’t understand their success is reliant on
standing out, not fitting in.
quotes.author: Don Draper

quotes.quote:
What’s the hardest thing to communicate? The hardest thing 
is to communicate.
quotes.author: Michael Cina

quotes.quote:
Don’t design for everyone. It’s impossible. All you end up
doing is designing something that makes everyone unhappy.
quotes.author: Leisa Reichelt

quotes.quote:
I try and be as stupid as possible regarding my profession,
which means I try to look at as few design magazines as
possible.
quotes.author: Ettore Sottsass

quotes.quote:
The great thing about personal work is that it can shape
your commercial work. Clients see what you create for
yourself and that can be the starting point for a new
project, which closes the cap between the work you love
making and the work you get paid for.
quotes.author: Gemma O’Brien

quotes.quote:
A work of art is one of mystery, the one extreme magic;
everything else is either arithmetic or biology.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote:
Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they
must live.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote:
Machines are better than me at whatever they’re for. That’s
the point of tools. A calculator is better than me at
238÷182 and a bucket is better than me at holding water.
quotes.author: Cassie Kozyrkov

quotes.quote:
Instead of searching for inspiration, how about you search
out someone to inspire.
quotes.author: Tony Kim

quotes.quote: Beauty is the ultimate defense against complexity.
quotes.author: David Gelernter

quotes.quote:
Clients have no trouble paying $5,800 for an hour in a
Gulfstream corporate jet or $425 for a month of parking. But
God forbid they spend $3 per on a glossy annual report.
quotes.author: Bill Cahan

quotes.quote:
Creative without strategy is called ‘art‘. Creative with
strategy is called ‘advertising‘.
quotes.author: Jef I. Richards

quotes.quote:
Design, in its broadest sense, is the enabler of the digital
era – it’s a process that creates order out of chaos, that
renders technology usable to business. Design means being
good, not just looking good.
quotes.author: Clement Mok

quotes.quote: Ideas are worthless. Execution is everything.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote:
The space between an idea and a concept is your lips. If you
can’t say it out loud you can’t do it.
quotes.author: Nick Longo

quotes.quote:
Visual design is powerful, but the words are what people
quote to one another. They are the only part of the design
that survives across time and media types. They can be held
intact in a human mind.
quotes.author: Erika Hall

quotes.quote:
Everybody’s a web designer until, you know, they actually
try to do it.
quotes.author: Gabe Boning

quotes.quote:
Be regular and orderly in your life like a bourgeois, so
that you may be violent and original in your work.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote:
I fill up a place, which may be better… when I have made it
empty.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A well-defined problem is half solved.
quotes.author: Michael Osborne

quotes.quote:
One should respect public opinion in so far as is necessary
to avoid starvation and to keep out of prison.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote:
I’m convinced that without bad design, the world would be a
far less stimulating place; we would have nothing to marvel
over and nothing to be nostalgic about.
quotes.author: Carrie Phillips

quotes.quote:
The best way to find any and all errors is to publish your
work.
quotes.author: Dan Vore

quotes.quote:
Graphic design is the paradise of individuality,
eccentricity, heresy, abnormality, hobbies and humours.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote:
The critical distinction between a craftsman and an expert
is what happens after a sufficient level of expertise has
been achieved. The expert will do everything she can to
remain wedded to a single context, narrowing the scope of
her learning, her practice, and her projects. The craftsman
has the courage and humility to set aside her expertise and
pick up an unfamiliar technology or learn a new domain.
quotes.author: Dave Hoover

quotes.quote: Form follows function.
quotes.author: Louis Sullivan

quotes.quote:
Creativity is in everyone; it just manifests itself
differently with each person. My CPA, for example, is one of
the most creative people I know.
quotes.author: Ron Miriello

quotes.quote:
When you’re passionate about what you do, you become an
evangelist for the very thing you do.
quotes.author: Jonathan Snook

quotes.quote:
Every night I pray that clients with taste will get money
and clients with money will get taste.
quotes.author: Bill Gardner

quotes.quote: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the face.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: Nothing’s impossible.
quotes.author: The Doorknob (Alice In Wonderland)

quotes.quote:
Using a watermark on your work is like peeing on your
belongings so no one will steal them.
quotes.author: Thomas Amador

quotes.quote:
What works good is better than what looks good, because what
works good lasts.
quotes.author: Ray Eames

quotes.quote:
Spec = asking the world to have sex with you and promising a
dinner date to one lucky winner.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: Eloquence is vehement simplicity.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.quote: There’s no shortcut for greatness.
quotes.author: Yasin Japardi

quotes.quote:
For every new feature we add, we take an old one out. A lot
of big sites don’t do that, and it’s a problem. Twitter
started as a beautifully simple product, but it’s now going
the same route as Facebook. The drive to innovate can
overencumber and destroy a product.
quotes.author: David Karp

quotes.quote:
I’ve always considered myself a graphic artists – a
draftsman – as opposed to a typist. I do still work on a
drawing table. At times drawing on a computer feels like I’m
drawing on an Etch-a-Sketch.
quotes.author: Michael Schwab

quotes.quote:
If all else fails, [working harder than anyone else] is the
greatest competitive advantage of any career.
quotes.author: John C Jay

quotes.quote:
To clarify, add detail. Imagine that, to clarify, add
detail. Clutter and overload are not attributes of
information, they are failures of design. If the information
is in chaos, don’t start throwing out information, instead
fix the design.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: We tend to forget there’s more to design than designing.
quotes.author: Justin Ahrens

quotes.quote:
If Ernest Hemingway, James Mitchener, Neil Simon, Frank
Lloyd Wright, and Pablo Picasso could not get it right the
first time, what makes you think that you will?
quotes.author: Paul Heckel

quotes.quote: Bad design is smoke, while good design is a mirror.
quotes.author: Juan-Carlos Fernandez

quotes.quote:
If you do good work for good clients, it will lead to other
good work for other good clients. If you do bad work for bad
clients, it will lead to other bad work for other bad
clients.
quotes.author: Michael Bierut

quotes.quote: Preparation gives birth to self-confidence.
quotes.author: Denise Harman

quotes.quote:
The dumbest mistake is viewing design as something you do at
the end of the process to ‘tidy up’ the mess, as opposed to
understanding it’s a ‘day one’ issue and part of everything.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: An ad should be an appetizer, not a buffet.
quotes.author: Lee Clow’s Beard

quotes.quote:
Her complexity is a glorious fire that consumes, while her
simplicity goes unapproachable. But if one takes time to
understand her, there is something beautiful to find,
something simple to be loved. But she goes unloved, for
being misunderstood.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote:
I don’t want something special. I want something beautifully
plain.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote:
Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values
determine the future.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: If the bones don’t work, you’ve got a pile of skin.
quotes.author: Samuel Antupit

quotes.quote:
Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money
they don’t have for something they don’t need.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote:
A good portfolio will get you an interview. A good attitude
will get you a job.
quotes.author: Marty Amsler

quotes.quote:
Here is one of the few effective keys to the design problem
— the ability of the designer to recognize as many of the
constraints as possible — his willingness and enthusiasm for
working within these constraints. Constraints of price, of
size, of strength, of balance, of surface, of time and so
forth.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Design is redesign.
quotes.author: Jan Michl

quotes.quote:
Typography has one plain duty before it and that is to
convey information in writing. No argument or consideration
can absolve typography from this duty.
quotes.author: Emil Ruder

quotes.quote: It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote:
I know the price of success: dedication, hard work & an
unremitting devotion to the things you want to see happen.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote:
It has taken my entire life to understand what I already
knew about creating art in 3rd grade.
quotes.author: Philip Carrera

quotes.quote:
The simplest way to achieve simplicity is through thoughtful
reduction.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote:
Design is more about the process than it is about the
resulting prettiness.
quotes.author: Melissa Sisco

quotes.quote:
In the design process, my gut instinct is my best critic. I
just wish I would always listen to it!
quotes.author: Bryan Tamayo

quotes.quote:
If the reader notices the interior page design of a book –
even if he or she likes what they see – I’ve missed, because
I distracted them from their reading.
quotes.author: Stephen Tiano

quotes.quote:
Traditional marketing is often seeing is getting people to
do things but I think web marketing is about helping people
do things.
quotes.author: Gerry McGovern

quotes.quote: An ad should be an appetizer, not a buffet.
quotes.author: Lee Clow’s Beard

quotes.quote:
Beautiful accidents can happen, but accident is not the
basis for design excellence. Purposeful discovery followed
by focused, skillful conceptualization and execution is the
basis for design excellence.
quotes.author: Andy Rutledge

quotes.quote:
Turning away bad clients can leave you feeling oddly guilty.
They’re sort of like alcoholic or meth head cousins who
force you, by their own bad behavior into denying them
things you wouldn’t deny other people. You’re left feeling
not quite yourself.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wood

quotes.quote:
Design is an art of situations. Designers respond to a need,
a problem, a circumstance, that arises in the world. The
best work is produced in relation to interesting situations
– an open-minded client, a good cause, or great content.
quotes.author: Ellen Lupton

quotes.quote: Clients are the difference between design and art.
quotes.author: Michael Bierut

quotes.quote:
Design must be functional and functionality must be
translated into visual aesthetics, without any reliance on
gimmicks that have to be explained.
quotes.author: Ferdinand A. Porsche

quotes.quote:
We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see
plenty there that needs to be done.
quotes.author: Alan Turing

quotes.quote:
If you think good design is expensive, you should look at
the cost of bad design.
quotes.author: Ralf Speth

quotes.quote:
Testing one user early in the project is better than testing
fifty near the end.
quotes.author: Steve Krug

quotes.quote:
Whether we like it or not, our legacy as designers is ugly.
We’re largely responsible for fueling a culture of
consumption.
quotes.author: Eric Karjaluoto

quotes.quote:
a 5% feature (used by less than 5% of all users) is a
distraction for all the other users, and is better removed,
unless it’s really critical (a small number of users do need
to cancel service, for example).
quotes.author: Neil Hunt

quotes.quote:
Write it down. You will lose thoughts, you thought, that you
thought.
quotes.author: Vanessa Workoff

quotes.quote:
If you’re more susceptible to interruption, you do more out
of the box thinking.
quotes.author: Don Norman

quotes.quote:
All things are designed, just some things more thoughtfully
than others.
quotes.author: Arman Nobari

quotes.quote:
Functionality is so over-valued in design, and we’ve kept
design very small in that way. Functionality is the sheer
minimum. If your house burns down, what do you take? The cat
in the window that you got from your mother, or the chair
you have?
quotes.author: Marcel Wanders

quotes.quote: Give a crap. Don’t give a fuck.
quotes.author: Karen McGrane

quotes.quote:
It’s not in the vulgar, it’s not in the shock that one finds
art. And it’s not in the excessively beautiful. It’s in
between; it’s in nuance.
quotes.author: Duane Michals

quotes.quote: Keep it simple, stupid!
quotes.author: Old Saying

quotes.quote: Information is cheap, meaning is expensive.
quotes.author: George Dyson

quotes.quote:
It is not daily increase but daily decrease; hack away the
unessential.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote:
Nobody can tell you if what you’re doing is good, meaningful
or worthwhile. The more compelling the path, the more lonely
it is.
quotes.author: Hugh Macleod

quotes.quote:
If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope
for it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Design is creativity with strategy.
quotes.author: Rob Curedale

quotes.quote:
I like jumping back and forth between a few different things
to let my subconscious chew on one problem while my
conscious works on something else.
quotes.author: Loren Brichter

quotes.quote:
In the presence of good rationale, maintainers should be
willing to change their mind often.
quotes.author: Havoc Pennington

quotes.quote: Design is where science and art break even.
quotes.author: Robin Mathew

quotes.quote:
The definition of an expert is someone who knows what not to
do.
quotes.author: Charles Willson

quotes.quote:
Create your own visual style… let it be unique for yourself
and yet identifiable for others.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote:
Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because
they get overcome by the beauty of the picture – and forget
that merchandise must be sold.
quotes.author: James Randolph Adams

quotes.quote:
Often design departments are viewed as little decoration
groups… They’ll make everything look pretty. Well, I can
tell you, that doesn’t work.
quotes.author: Peter Phillips

quotes.quote: Having a style is like being in jail.
quotes.author: Anthon Beeke

quotes.quote:
For me, discomfort is a signal of an exceptional concept.
When I’m totally comfortable with a concept, I’ve probably
used it fore or seen it somewhere else. Discomfort is almost
a prerequisite for a great idea.
quotes.author: Craig Frazier

quotes.quote:
The typeface doesn’t really matter, as long as the text is
good.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.quote:
Advertising is the one industry where all the experts seem
to be the people who don’t work in it.
quotes.author: William Childs

quotes.quote:
Clients don’t understand their success is reliant on
standing out, not fitting in.
quotes.author: Don Draper

quotes.quote:
Never fall in love with an idea. They’re whores. If the one
you’re with isn’t doing the job, there’s always, always,
always another.
quotes.author: Chip Kidd

quotes.quote:
If Ernest Hemingway, James Mitchener, Neil Simon, Frank
Lloyd Wright, and Pablo Picasso could not get it right the
first time, what makes you think that you will?
quotes.author: Paul Heckel

quotes.quote:
Drawing is speaking to the eye; talking is painting to the
ear.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Creativity is magical, but is not magic.
quotes.author: Charles Limb

quotes.quote:
Everything is possible, that’s what science is all about.
No, that’s what’s being a Magical Elf is all about.
quotes.author: The Professor (on Futurama)

quotes.quote:
Visual design is often the polar opposite of engineering:
trading hard edges for subjective decisions based on gut
feelings and personal experiences. It’s messy,
unpredictable, and notoriously hard to measure. The
apparently erratic behavior of artists drives engineers
bananas. Their decisions seem arbitrary and risk everything
with no guaranteed benefit.
quotes.author: Scott Stevenson

quotes.quote:
When it comes to writing code, the number one most important
skill is how to keep a tangle of features from collapsing
under the weight of its own complexity.
quotes.author: John D. Cook

quotes.quote:
Don’t spend too much time planning, release early and often,
some things will work, others won’t, refine and move forward
and above all forget the money, just make sure you love what
you’re doing.
quotes.author: Kevin Rose

quotes.quote:
If you never want to be criticized, for goodness’ sake don’t
do anything new.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Inspiration the seed. Design but the flower.
quotes.author: Michael Langham

quotes.quote:
Roses are red, violets are blue. I wont send the job unless
you pay me.
quotes.author: Giulio Pinotti

quotes.quote:
It’s very easy to be different, but very difficult to be
better.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: Design can have many types of soul, the key is to have one.
quotes.author: Justin Ahrens

quotes.quote: I like my ARTSY with a little bit of FARTSY.
quotes.author: Marc Johns

quotes.quote:
[Degenerate type is] a form of canned cynicism which will
doom its perpetrators to a special room in hell where lovely
little children of all races, creeds, and religions are
eternally batched in gentle rosy and amber glows, singing
“It’s a small world after all.” There’s no reason to create
an alphabet which looks like it leaked out a diaper.
quotes.author: Peter Fraterdeus

quotes.quote: Good designers copy; great designers steal.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote:
Descriptions are like skirts, they should be long enough to
cover the subject, but short enough to keep things
interesting.
quotes.author: Gidsy.com

quotes.quote:
Users will tell you what they think they want.
Users will tell you what they think you want to hear.
Users will tell you what they think sounds good.
Users will not tell you what you need to know.
You have to watch them to discover that.
quotes.author: Adam Judge

quotes.quote:
… try to absorb what is useful, discard what is useless, and
add what is essentially your own.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote:
Here is one of the few effective keys to the design problem
— the ability of the designer to recognize as many of the
constraints as possible — his willingness and enthusiasm for
working within these constraints. Constraints of price, of
size, of strength, of balance, of surface, of time and so
forth.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote:
You get up early in the morning and you work all day. That’s
the only secret.
quotes.author: Philip Glass

quotes.quote:
I have found the best people to work with are gay men. They
never have to ‘run it past their wives.’
quotes.author: Rodney Davidson

quotes.quote:
To create a memorable design you need to start with a
thought that’s worth remembering.
quotes.author: Thomas Manss

quotes.quote:
Designers deal in ideas. They give shape to ideas that shape
our world, enrich everyday experiences, and improve our
lives. Where there’s confusion, designers fashion clarity;
where there’s chaos, designers construct order; where
there’s entropy, designers promote vitality; where there’s
indifference, designers swell passion; where there’s
mediocrity, designers imbue excellence; and where there’s
silence, designers lend voice.
quotes.author: Ken Peters

quotes.quote:
If you are on Craigslist to get a sofa, and you see one for
free. You think there’s something tragically wrong with it –
maybe there are bedbugs. But if you see a sofa on there for
$2,500, you think ‘oh man, that sofa must be amazing’. It’s
the same thing with art – you set your own value.
quotes.author: Jessica Hische

quotes.quote:
There are two ways of constructing a software design. One
way is to make it so simple that there are obviously no
deficiencies. And the other way is to make it so complicated
that there are no obvious deficiencies.
quotes.author: C.A.R. Hoare

quotes.quote:
Wisdom is knowing what to do next, skill is knowing how to
do it, and virtue is doing it.
quotes.author: David Starr

quotes.quote:
The first word of the first line is the critical word of
that particular body of text. Let it start flush, at least.
quotes.author: W.A. Dwiggins

quotes.quote:
Objects and their manufacture are inseparable, you
understand a product if you understand how it’s made.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote:
Standards are like toothbrushes, everybody agrees you should
have one, but no one wants to use yours.
quotes.author: Joe Croser

quotes.quote:
If you want to set off and go develop some grand new thing,
you don’t need millions of dollars of capitalization. You
need enough pizza and Diet Coke to stick in your
refrigerator, a cheap PC to work on and the dedication to go
through with it.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote:
If you are going to have less things, they have to be great
things.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote:
To create anything–whether a short story or a magazine
profile or a film or a sitcom–is to believe, if only
momentarily, you are capable of magic.
quotes.author: Tom Bissel

quotes.quote:
If all else fails, [working harder than anyone else] is the
greatest competitive advantage of any career.
quotes.author: John C Jay

quotes.quote: A picture is worth a thousand dollars.
quotes.author: Marty Neumeier

quotes.quote: Design works best when it gets out of the user’s way.
quotes.author: Neil Gajera

quotes.quote:
God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot
change, the courage to change the things I can, and the
wisdom to know the difference
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote:
The same hand can draw art for the sake of emotional
expression and design that serves a purpose.
quotes.author: Raphael Henry

quotes.quote:
That’s why pro bono work is great. You choose to do it, and
if you’re choosing to do it to grow your own work, your deal
is essentially that you’re not going to collaborate. You’re
going to do the job the way you think the job is gonna be
done.
quotes.author: Paula Scher

quotes.quote:
Draw lines, young man, many lines; from memory or from
nature – it is in this way you will become a good artist.
(said to Edgar Degas)
quotes.author: Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres

quotes.quote: I like my ARTSY with a little bit of FARTSY.
quotes.author: Marc Johns

quotes.quote: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the face.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote:
Her complexity is a glorious fire that consumes, while her
simplicity goes unapproachable. But if one takes time to
understand her, there is something beautiful to find,
something simple to be loved. But she goes unloved, for
being misunderstood.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote:
Says who? Just so you know, the people who talk that way
think that monkeys can do this. They take all this monkey
crap and just stick it in a briefcase completely unaware
that their success depends on something more than their
shoeshine. YOU are the product. You- FEELING something.
That’s what sells. Not them. Not sex. They can’t do what we
do, and they hate us for it.
quotes.author: Don Draper

quotes.quote:
Roses are red, violets are blue. I wont send the job unless
you pay me.
quotes.author: Giulio Pinotti

quotes.quote:
Design should never be ridden with GGE’s (gratuitous graphic
elements).
quotes.author: Nadine Buckley

quotes.quote:
The worst logo applied well is better than the best logo
applied poorly.
quotes.author: Jacob Cass

quotes.quote:
In the matter of layout, forget art and use horse-sense. The
printer-designer’s whole duty is to make a clear
presentation of the message… This calls for an exercise of
common sense and faculty of analysis rather than for art.
quotes.author: William Addison Dwiggins

quotes.quote:
It’s quicker to hate on a design picking out all the little
things that should have done than to just do something great
yourself.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.quote:
It’s art if it can’t be explained. It’s fashion if no one
asks for an explanation. It’s design if it doesn’t need
explanation.
quotes.author: Wouter Stokkel

quotes.quote:
Standards are like sex; one mistake, and you’re stuck
supporting it forever!
quotes.author: Mark Pilgrim

quotes.quote:
It’s strange, I’ve seen colours at times that when I’ve gone
back to check on them, they’ve vanished…
quotes.author: William Percy Weston

quotes.quote:
We unfortunately live in a corporate world where group
decision making is made to avoid failure rather than to
achieve success.
quotes.author: Bill Cahan

quotes.quote:
Once you eliminate quality as a requirement, the entire
design process becomes a whole lot easier.
quotes.author: Jared M. Spool

quotes.quote:
When I design, I don’t consider the technical or commercial
parameters so much as the desire for a dream that humans
have attempted to project onto an object.
quotes.author: Philippe Starck

quotes.quote:
If we want users to like our software we should design it to
behave like a likeable person: respectful, generous and
helpful.
quotes.author: Alan Cooper

quotes.quote:
Check your bookshelf. If it’s full of titles on HTML, CSS,
and the like, instead of typography, color, and layout, you
may be missing a key ingredient in the designer’s knowledge
diet.
quotes.author: Jeff Croft

quotes.quote:
The time it takes to make a decision increases as the number
of alternatives increases.
quotes.author: William Edmund Hick

quotes.quote:
Here’s the world’s worst idea for a movie: Titanic. It did
okay at the box office.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote:
Rules are what the artist breaks; the memorage never emerged
from a formula.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote:
The control which designers know in the print medium, and
often desire in the web medium, is simply a function of the
limitation of the printed page. We should embrace the fact
that the web doesn’t have the same constraints, and design
for this flexibility. But first, we must “accept the ebb and
flow of things.”
quotes.author: John Allsopp

quotes.quote: Innovation is seldom hindered by platform.
quotes.author: Blue Saunders

quotes.quote: People ignore design that ignores people.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: The large print giveth and the small print taketh away.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote:
I love the comment, “You must love designing for a living.”
At that point I usually start to laugh or break into
uncontrollable tears.
quotes.author: Andrew Lewis

quotes.quote:
“Fun” is a tricky word. People think that if you’re having
“fun”, you’re ignoring content, or you’re ignoring the
importance of the piece. But that’s not true.
quotes.author: Carin Goldberg

quotes.quote: Copying one person is stealing. Copying ten is research.
quotes.author: Chet Atkins

quotes.quote:
One of the most significant differences between graphic
designers and other visual artists is our unhinged love of
typography.
quotes.author: Greg Breeding

quotes.quote:
Whoever best describes the problem, is the one most likely
to solve it.
quotes.author: Dan Roam

quotes.quote:
The whole essence of good drawing—and of good thinking,
perhaps—is to work a subject down to the simplest form
possible and still have it believable for what it is meant
to be.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote:
Never re-invent the wheel, unless you’re sure the client
needn’t go anywhere.
quotes.author: Russell Bishop

quotes.quote:
I can always find love, but eventually I get horny for my
creativity.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote:
I don’t know the key to success, but the key to failure is
trying to please everybody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: We should pursue and practice moderation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote:
If you never venture outside the box, you will probably not
be creative. But if you never get inside the box, you will
certainly be stupid.
quotes.author: Christopher Peterson

quotes.quote:
Good design begins with honesty, asks tough questions, comes
from collaboration and from trusting your intuition.
quotes.author: Freeman Thomas

quotes.quote:
The world always seems brighter when you’ve just made
something that wasn’t there before.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote:
As long as there are people, there will be user experience,
and user interface designers.
quotes.author: Steve McGarry

quotes.quote:
I can never stand still. I must explore and experiment. I am
never satisfied with my work. I resent the limitations of my
own imagination.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote:
Design is an art of situations. Designers respond to a need,
a problem, a circumstance, that arises in the world. The
best work is produced in relation to interesting situations
– an open-minded client, a good cause, or great content.
quotes.author: Ellen Lupton

quotes.quote:
Research not to discover what’s already there, but to
discover what’s not.
quotes.author: Samadara Ginige

quotes.quote:
The only “intuitive” interface is the nipple. After that
it’s all learned.
quotes.author: Bruce Ediger

quotes.quote:
Be fluid. Treat each project differently. Be water, man. The
best style is no style. Because styles can be figured out.
And when you have no style they can’t figure you out.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote:
Features are like having sex. You make one mistake and you
have to support it for life.
quotes.author: Dave McClure

quotes.quote:
In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in
the expert’s mind there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote:
The conclusion of design flows naturally from the data; we
should not shrink from it; we should embrace it and build on
it.
quotes.author: Michael Behe

quotes.quote:
Web design is responsive design. Responsive web design is
web design, done right.
quotes.author: Andy Clarke

quotes.quote:
Every picture owes more to other pictures painted before
than it owes to nature.
quotes.author: E.H. Gombrich

quotes.quote:
Well you’re in your little room
and you’re working on something good
but if it’s really good
you’re gonna need a bigger room
and when you’re in the bigger room
you might not know what to do
you might have to think of
how you got started sitting in your little room

(from the song “Little Room”)
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.quote: Designers must be stewards of design rather than dictators.
quotes.author: Cassie McDaniel

quotes.quote: Done is beautiful.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote:
It’s amazing how much you can get done in a day if you just
sit and you do it.
quotes.author: Bill Tregle’s Dad

quotes.quote:
I try and be as stupid as possible regarding my profession,
which means I try to look at as few design magazines as
possible.
quotes.author: Ettore Sottsass

quotes.quote:
No one ever discovered anything new by coloring inside the
lines.
quotes.author: Thomas Vasquez

quotes.quote:
The ability to change on a dime is one thing small teams
have by default that big teams can never have. This is where
the big guys envy the little guys. What might take a big
team in a huge organization weeks to change may only take a
day in a small, lean organization. That advantage is
priceless.
quotes.author: Andrew Hunt

quotes.quote:
Better to be tentative than to be recklessly sure—to be an
apprentice at sixty, than to present oneself as a doctor at
ten.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem de Montaigne

quotes.quote:
We are all designers, the difference is that only a few of
us do it full-time.
quotes.author: Sabo Tercero

quotes.quote:
Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values
determine the future.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: The details are not the details. They make the design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote:
Testing one user early in the project is better than testing
fifty near the end.
quotes.author: Steve Krug

quotes.quote: Just because it’s simple doesn’t mean it makes sense.
quotes.author: Morgan Ashley

quotes.quote:
What works good is better than what looks good, because what
works good lasts.
quotes.author: Ray Eames

quotes.quote:
Often design departments are viewed as little decoration
groups… They’ll make everything look pretty. Well, I can
tell you, that doesn’t work.
quotes.author: Peter Phillips

quotes.quote:
Let the design team be the design experts. Your job is to be
the business expert. Ask them how their design solutions
meet your business goals. If you trust your design team, and
they can explain how their recommendations map to those
goals, you’re fine. If you neither trust them, nor can they
defend their choices it’s time to get a new design team.
quotes.author: Mike Monteiro

quotes.quote:
You can’t do better design with a computer, but you can
speed up your work enormously.
quotes.author: Wim Crouwel

quotes.quote:
Learning Web Design is like playing video games: You start
small and build your character as you progress, then you
beat the boss, literally.
quotes.author: Ricardo Zea

quotes.quote:
To create a memorable design you need to start with a
thought that’s worth remembering.
quotes.author: Thomas Manss

quotes.quote:
Design is the contrast of the core of limitations therefore
there are no boundaries. It is simply an interpretation of
creativity.
quotes.author: Jenaiha Woods

quotes.quote:
Here’s how we work. Somebody calls up with a project; we do
some stuff; and the money follows.
quotes.author: Tim Brennan

quotes.quote:
An enterprise’s most vital assets lie in its design and
other creative capabilities.
quotes.author: Kun-Hee Lee

quotes.quote: Don’t try to be original try to be good.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote:
Simplicity will stand out, while complexity will get lost in
the crowd.
quotes.author: Kevin Barnett

quotes.quote:
The quality of any creative endeavor tends to approach the
level of taste of whoever is in charge.
quotes.author: John Gruber

quotes.quote:
Turning away bad clients can leave you feeling oddly guilty.
They’re sort of like alcoholic or meth head cousins who
force you, by their own bad behavior into denying them
